homePage.heroSubtitle: Cultivate connections, share the joy of plants, and grow together in our vibrant community.
homePage.feature1Description: Offer a new home to plants or find your ideal green companion
homePage.feature2Description: Connect with plant enthusiasts and share your green journey
homePage.feature3Description: Participate in workshops, seminars, and plant exchanges
homePage.feature4Description: Access a wealth of plant care and gardening advice
homePage.missionDescription: We are committed to fostering a community of plant lovers and environmental advocates. Our mission is to promote sustainable living, biodiversity, and the joy of nurturing nature.
homePage.contactDescription: Have a question or want to collaborate? Fill out the form below and we'll get back to you as soon as possible.
homePage.tellUsHowWeCanHelp: Tell us how we can help

about.title: About us
about.description1: GreenConnect is an innovative platform created for plant lovers, designed to bring together a passionate community to share, donate, and exchange plants and gardening knowledge.
about.description2: Born from a love for plants and a desire to promote sustainability, GreenConnect is a unique online space where users can offer and adopt plants for free. It serves as a bridge between gardeners, enabling them to share their resources, advice, and enthusiasm with one another.
about.tagline: Together, let's cultivate a green future!
about.taglineDescription: Discover our passionate commitment to a greener and more sustainable world, guided by our vision and mission.
about.missionDescription: We are committed to promoting an ecological culture by raising awareness among citizens about the importance of a healthy environment and a life in harmony with nature.
about.visionDescription: A future where every home is a living ecosystem that respects the environment, where nature and humans coexist in perfect harmony.

conversationsPage.chooseConversation: Choose a conversation from the list to start chatting

postsPage.title: Discover Amazing Plants
postsPage.noPlants: No plants found. Try adjusting your filters.

postDetails.signInMessage: Please sign in to connect with other plant enthusiasts.

policyPage.title: GreenConnect Policies
policyPage.subtitle: Nurturing a safe, sustainable, and thriving community of plant enthusiasts while protecting our users and the environment.

communityGuidelines.title: Community Guidelines
content: Respect all members of the GreenConnect community, regardless of their experience level or background.
Share knowledge, experiences, and tips openly to help others grow in their plant care journey.
Avoid promotional or spam content that doesn't contribute to meaningful discussions.
Report any inappropriate behavior, harassment, or content that violates our guidelines.
Be patient, supportive, and encouraging, especially with new plant enthusiasts.
Use inclusive language and avoid discriminatory comments or posts.
Give credit when sharing others' content or photos.
Engage in constructive discussions and provide helpful feedback when possible.

privacyPolicy.title: Privacy Policy
content: We collect minimal personal information necessary for account creation and platform functionality.
Your plant data and personal information are kept confidential and never sold to third parties.
You can request the deletion of your account and associated data at any time through our support channels.
We use cookies to enhance your browsing experience and provide personalized content.
We may send occasional emails about important updates, new features, or community events. You can opt-out at any time.
Your profile information is visible to other users by default, but you can adjust your privacy settings.
We use industry-standard security measures to protect your data from unauthorized access.
In case of a data breach, we will notify affected users promptly and take necessary steps to secure the platform.

rightsObligations.title: Your Rights and Obligations
content: Right to access and rectify your personal data at any time.
Obligation to respect the copyrights of content shared on the platform.
Right to delete your account and data, in accordance with applicable laws.
Obligation not to use the platform for illegal or harmful purposes.
Right to contest any automated decision concerning you and request human intervention.
Obligation to maintain the confidentiality of your login information.
Right to data portability to other services, where possible.
Obligation to report any inappropriate content or violation of terms of use.

sustainabilityCommitment.title: Sustainability Commitment
content: We use eco-friendly hosting solutions powered by 100% renewable energy for our servers.
Our office operations are carbon-neutral, utilizing energy-efficient equipment and practices.
We organize annual tree-planting events in local communities to offset our carbon footprint.
We actively promote sustainable gardening practices through educational content and workshops.
We partner with organizations dedicated to biodiversity conservation and environmental protection.
Our merchandise is made from sustainable materials and shipped using eco-friendly packaging.
We encourage users to trade or donate plants locally to reduce transportation emissions.
We're committed to continuous improvement in our sustainability efforts and welcome user suggestions.

importantNotice.title: Important Notice
importantNotice.content: By using GreenConnect, you agree to abide by these policies and contribute to our growing, eco-conscious community. We reserve the right to update these policies as needed to ensure the best experience for all users and to comply with changing regulations.

deletePostModal.title: Delete Post
deletePostModal.content: Are you sure you want to delete this post? This action cannot be undone.
